ISSS608 Visual Analytics and Applications Homepage

Hey there! Welcome to my Visual Analytics and Applications page which documents and showcase my coursework and projects for this module.

From here, you can see how I utilise various data analytics methods to interact with data and explore relationships where I try to “detect the expected and discover the unexpected”.
